sentences.english: Most importantly the support continues to roll in.
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，这些捐助在源源不断地大量输往海地。

sentences.english: Interest arising on the overall cash balance attributable to individual donors will be recorded in the account.
sentences.chinese: 将在帐目中记录各捐助方现金总结余产生的利息。

sentences.english: In Chinese society very few fairy godmothers can be discovered.
sentences.chinese: 在中国社会里，很少有钱的女人慷慨捐助。

sentences.english: Symbolically significant donations are pouring in too.
sentences.chinese: 象征性意义重大的捐助也在跟进。

sentences.english: Some donors and health communities have embraced micronutrient interventions.
sentences.chinese: 一些捐助者和卫生界已经接纳了微量营养物质干预。

sentences.english: Your charitable contribution shows that you have a big heart.
sentences.chinese: 你的慈善捐助表明你有一颗仁善之心。

sentences.english: Most donors have promised to keep to their commitments for aid spending.
sentences.chinese: 大多数捐助者已承诺继续履行其对援助开支的承诺。

sentences.english: She donated a certain sum of money from her private purse.
sentences.chinese: 她个人解囊捐助一笔钱。

sentences.english: Monthly donate US$50 for a term of three years.
sentences.chinese: 每月捐助美金五十元，三年为期。

sentences.english: I'm proud that I can help so many people.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望人们通过向奥比斯捐助来支持我们的工作。

sentences.english: We would like to donate to ORBIS and help restoring sight of blind people worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 我们愿意捐助奥比斯，帮助世上失明人士重见光明。

sentences.english: Already, Brazil's Bahia state has pledged to donate a further US$3.5 million.
sentences.chinese: 巴西的巴伊亚州已经承诺捐助350万美元。

sentences.english: Donors from about 80 countries are expected at the one-day conference.
sentences.chinese: 来自80个国家的捐助者将出席这一为期一天的会议。

sentences.english: Help an entrepreneur with aKiva donation.
sentences.chinese: 通过Kiva捐助帮助一名企业家。

sentences.english: And after two years Malawi became a food donor to neighbouring countries.
sentences.chinese: 两年后，马拉维成为了邻国的食品捐助国。

sentences.english: A liturgy, he's taking some help to what he calls "the saints" in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 一次礼拜，他把捐助带给耶路撒冷的圣徒。

definition: to donate money/to contribute funds/donation/contribution (of money)
to donate goods (to a relief effort)/to contribute material
to contribute generously (idiom); help sb generously with money/to give generously to charity
